summary.span: 提供一个哈希表/字典实现，其中包含组件所使用的 WPF 资源以及 WPF 应用程序的其他元素。

span.span: Provides a hash table / dictionary implementation that contains WPF resources used by components and other elements of a WPF application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当加载程序加载应用程序代码时，中的项不会立即进行处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The items in a are not immediately processed when application code is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loader. 相反，将 以对象的形式保留，单独的值仅在被明确请求时处理。Instead, the persists as an object, and the individual values are processed only when they are specifically requested. 类不是从派生的 。The class is not derived from . 相反， 类实现 但同时依赖于 。Instead, the class implements but relies on a internally. 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ， 类通常是一个隐式集合元素，该元素是多个属性的对象元素值 `Resources` （在属性元素语法中给定）。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], the class is typically an implicit collection element that is the object element value of several `Resources` properties, when given in property element syntax. 有关中的隐式集合的详细信息 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，请参阅[XAML 语法详述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail)。For details on implicit collections in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail). 如果要指定合并字典，则会出现异常;有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries)。An exception is when you want to specify a merged dictionary; for details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries). 另一种可能的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 用法是将资源字典声明为离散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 文件，并在运行时将其加载到 中，或将其作为资源或松散文件包含在 (完全信任的) 项目中。Another possible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage is to declare a resource dictionary as a discrete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, and either load it at run time with or include it in a (full-trust) project as a resource or loose file. 在这种情况下， 可以将声明为对象元素，作为的根元素 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。In this case, can be declared as an object element, serving as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] `x:` [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 如果打算将其用作根元素，则必须将相应的 XML 命名空间值映射 (命名空间的默认值，并且对于命名空间，通常) 到元素上。You must map the appropriate XML namespace values (default for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespace and typically `x:` for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] namespace) onto the element if you plan to use it as the root element. 然后，可以添加定义资源的子元素，每个元素都有一个 " [x：Key](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) " 值。Then you can add child elements that define the resources, each with an [x:Key](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) value. ## XAML 隐式集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourcesProperty**resourcesProperty* 一个属性，该属性指定属性元素，该属性的值类型为 。A property specifying a property element, where the value type of that property is . 通常，这是 `Resources` 或 的属性，或 在应用程序资源的情况下。Typically, this is the `Resources` property of or , or of in an application resources case. *oneOrMoreResources**oneOrMoreResources* 指定为对象元素的一个或多个资源。One or more resources specified as object elements. 指定的每个资源都必须分配有 " [x：Key" 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive)。Each resource that you specify must have an [x:Key Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive) assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试添加重复的键时引发异常。Attempting to add a duplicate key raises an exception. 密钥始终添加到基本字典。Keys are always added to the base dictionary. 不会检查当前中的键是否 重复，仅检查基本字典中是否有重复项。Keys in within the current are not checked for duplication, only the base dictionary is checked for duplicates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法表示将要加载的内容 。Calling this method is an indication that the contents of the are about to be loaded. 此过程中的下一步是调用 。The next step in the process is to call . 调用之前，不要多次调用 。Do not call more than once, before calling . 这样做将引发异常。Doing so will raise an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要清除合并字典项，请从集合中获取特定字典， 并专门 针对该字典调用 ，尽管字典通常是远程的，你可能没有访问权限。If you need to clear merged dictionary items, obtain the particular dictionary from collection and specifically call on that , although typically the dictionaries are remote and you might not have access. 或者， 通过对泛型集合调用 remove 来删除整个。Alternatively, remove the entire from by calling Remove on the generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求的项不在此资源字典中，框架资源系统还将检查合并的字典。If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the framework resource system will also check the merged dictionaries. 按项或索引检查通常不是检索资源的首选方法。Checking a by item or index is not generally the preferred way to retrieve resources. 你应调用能够参与整个资源查找过程的方法，并按其键查找资源，并可在应用程序或主题中查找资源。You should instead call methods that are capable of participating in the full resource lookup process and look up resources by their keys, and that can find the resources in applications or themes. 是这样的方法，并且存在于任何上 。 is such a method, and is present on any . 否则，尝试查找该资源并不符合真正的运行时行为。Otherwise your attempt to find the resource does not match the true run-time behavior. 但是，如果要从已知位置检索资源，则可以直接从单个字典获取资源 ，这样做是为了避免运行时键查找可能的性能和作用域含义。However, obtaining resources directly from an individual dictionary might be appropriate if you are retrieving resources from a known location, and are doing so to avoid the possible performance and scope implications of run-time key lookup. 不使用索引器在中定义集合成员 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。You do not use indexers to define collection members in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 而是在标记中创建子元素。Instead, you create child elements in markup. 子元素是的子元素 ，或者是属性类型为的属性元素的子元素 `ResourceDictionary` 。The child elements are either child elements of , or of a property element where the property type is `ResourceDictionary`. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的 " [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 使用情况" 部分 。For details, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage sections in .

summary.span: 获取此 中包含的所有键的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all keys contained in this .
The collection of all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性存在，因为它是必需的 ，但 通常在大多数情况下都不起作用 。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 返回的键不包括中的键 。The returned keys do not include keys within the . 此外，keys 集合是基本字典中的键的快照。Also the keys collection is a snapshot of the keys in the base dictionary. 如果你随后对此进行 了更改，则存储的 将不会反映这些更改。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MergedDictionaries As Collection(Of ResourceDictionary)

summary.span: 获取 字典的集合，这些字典构成了合并字典中的各种资源字典。

span.span: Gets a collection of the dictionaries that constitute the various resource dictionaries in the merged dictionaries.
The collection of merged dictionaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将添加 到由引用的泛型集合来合并字典 。Dictionaries are merged by adding a to the generic collection referenced by . 在标记中，合并的不 包含其中定义的资源元素。A merged does not have resource elements defined within it in markup. 相反，合并的字典是 不 (或在未通过代码) 添加任何元素的情况下定义的标记子元素，而是使用为指定的 URI 。Instead, the merged dictionary is a with no markup child elements defined (or with no elements added through code), but with a URI specified for . 指定使合并字典可以来自外部源，如应用程序附带的单独资源程序集、"松散 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] " 或特定的本地化或全局资源程序集。The designation enables the merged dictionary to come from an external source, such as a separate resource assembly that ships with the application, "loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]", or a specific localization or global resources assembly. 不支持在指定的中指定资源元素 。Specifying resource elements within a that has specified is not supported. 集合内的查找行为 将首先搜索最后添加的 ，并在找到请求的密钥后立即停止搜索。Lookup behavior within the collection will search the last-added first, and the search stops as soon as a requested key is found. 跨合并字典的集合中的重复键是非法的。Duplicate keys across the collection of merged dictionaries are not illegal. 有关合并字典行为的详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries)。For more information on merged dictionary behavior, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries**oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries* 一个或多个 对象元素。One or more object elements. 用于的不 具有集合内容，并指定 远程引用完整的特性 。A used for does not have collection content, and specifies a attribute that references the complete remotely. ## Examples 下面的示例指定两个 要合并到主副本中的元素 。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不 包含具有指定键的元素，则将 保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is raised. 此方法不会从中删除键 。This method does not remove keys from the . 您必须 从集合中获取特定的，以删除这些键，但这可能是不可能的，因为您通常会远程访问此类字典。You must obtain the specific from the collection to remove those keys, but that might not be possible because you are typically accessing such a dictionary remotely.

value.span: 外部资源字典的源位置。

span.span: The source location of an external resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常， 被指定为 PACK URI，该 URI 引用由应用程序生成项目包含为非编译资源或内容生成操作的资源字典的位置。Typically, is specified as a Pack URI, which references the location of a resource dictionary that is included as a noncompiled Resource or Content build action by your application building project. 有关 Pack URI 格式的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的 Pack uri](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf)。For details on the Pack URI format, see [Pack URIs in WPF](/dotnet/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf). 通常情况下， 仅为为 属性指定的指定的属性 (作为中的属性元素 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，或者设置为 代码) 中的集合的项。Generally, the property is set only for a that is specified for the property (either as a property element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or as a item of the collection in code). 在此上下文中，设置的值 会将在提供的 URI 中找到的字典内容合并到当前中 。In this context, setting the value for will merge the dictionary contents found at the supplied URI into the current . 任何加载失败都将导致引发异常。Any load failures will cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例指定两个 要合并到主副本中的元素 。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

summary.span: 获取与此 中包含的键关联的所有值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all values associated with keys contained in this .
The collection of all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性存在，因为它是必需的 ，但通常在大多数情况下都不起作用 。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 返回的值不包括中的值 。The returned values do not include values within the . 此外，该集合是基本字典中的值的快照。Also the collection is a snapshot of the values in the base dictionary. 如果你随后对此进行 了更改，则存储的 将不会反映这些更改。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.
